venue.address_2: (A few hundred feet East of Mt. Clinton Rd)
venue.name: AMC Highland Center at Crawford Notch

item.description:
We will be hiking 5 of the Presidential 4000footers.

 

We will meet at 4:30am at the Highland Center, drop one car at the end of the Jackson-Webster Trail (in case we add Jackson to our hike for a 6th Presi).  We will then drive to the Cog Railway Station and hike:

Jewell to Boundary

Boundary to Jefferson Notch Rd (still closed)

Jefferson Notch to Caps Ridge Trail

Caps Ridge Trail to the top of Jefferson

then ridge hike to Mt Washington, Monroe, Eisenhower and Pierce.  When reaching Pierce we decide whether we add Jackson as the final summit for the day.

 

We will hike between 17-23mi and need to be prepared for all sorts of weather conditions.

 

As this meet up is a last minute event, interested members were provided with addt. information, incl. required gear,...
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the parking lot
item.name: Hike 5 Presis--Jefferson to Pierce
